verses.verse: וְהִתְנַבִּ֞י <WH5013> prophesied חַגַּ֣י <WH2292> Haggai [נְבִיאָה כ] (נְבִיָּ֗א <WH5013> prophesied ק) וּזְכַרְיָ֤ה <WH2148> and Zechariah בַר־ <WH1247> the son עִדּוֹא֙ <WH5714> of Iddo [נְבִיאַיָּא כ] (נְבִיַּיָּ֔א <WH5013> prophesied ק) עַל־ <WH5922> unto יְה֣וּדָיֵ֔א <WH3062> the Jews דִּ֥י <WH1768> who בִיה֖וּד <WH3061> that [were] in Judah וּבִירוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <WH3390> and Jerusalem בְּשֻׁ֛ם <WH8036> in the name אֱלָ֥הּ <WH426> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3479> of Israel עֲלֵיהֽוֹן׃ <WH5922> [even] unto ס

בֵּאדַ֡יִן <WH116> Then קָ֠מוּ <WH6966> rose up זְרֻבָּבֶ֤ל <WH2217> Zerubbabel בַּר־ <WH1247> the son שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל֙ <WH7598> of Shealtiel וְיֵשׁ֣וּעַ <WH3443> and Jeshua בַּר־ <WH1247> the son יֽוֹצָדָ֔ק <WH3136> of Jozadak וְשָׁרִ֣יו <WH8271> and began לְמִבְנֵ֔א <WH1124> to build בֵּ֥ית <WH1005> the house אֱלָהָ֖א <WH426> of God דִּ֣י <WH1768> which בִירֽוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <WH3390> which [is] at Jerusalem וְעִמְּה֛וֹן <WH5974> and with them [נְבִיאַיָּא כ] (נְבִיַּיָּ֥א <WH5029> prophet ק) דִֽי־ <WH1768> which אֱלָהָ֖א <WH426> of God מְסָעֲדִ֥ין <WH5583> helping לְהֽוֹן׃ פ

בֵּהּ־ זִמְנָא֩ <WH2166> At the same time אֲתָ֨א <WH858> came עֲלֵיה֜וֹן <WH5922> unto them תַּ֠תְּנַי <WH8674> Tattenai פַּחַ֧ת <WH6347> to them Tatnai governor עֲבַֽר־ <WH5675> on this side נַהֲרָ֛ה <WH5103> the river וּשְׁתַ֥ר בּוֹזְנַ֖י <WH8370> and Shetharboznai וּכְנָוָתְה֑וֹן <WH3675> and their companions וְכֵן֙ <WH3652> thus אָמְרִ֣ין <WH560> and said לְהֹ֔ם מַן־ <WH4479> Who שָׂ֨ם <WH7761> issued לְכֹ֜ם טְעֵ֗ם <WH2942> A decree בַּיְתָ֤א <WH1005> house דְנָה֙ <WH1836> this לִבְּנֵ֔א <WH1124> you to build וְאֻשַּׁרְנָ֥א <WH846> wall דְנָ֖ה <WH1836> this לְשַׁכְלָלָֽה׃ <WH3635> and to make up ס

אֱדַ֥יִן <WH116> Then כְּנֵ֖מָא <WH3660> we unto them after this manner אֲמַ֣רְנָא <WH560> said לְּהֹ֑ם מַן־ <WH4479> What אִנּוּן֙ <WH581> are שְׁמָהָ֣ת <WH8036> the names גֻּבְרַיָּ֔א <WH1400> of the men דִּֽי־ <WH1768> were who דְנָ֥ה <WH1836> this בִנְיָנָ֖א <WH1147> building בָּנַֽיִן׃ <WH1124> that make

וְעֵ֣ין <WH5870> But the eye אֱלָהֲהֹ֗ם <WH426> of their God הֲוָת֙ <WH1934> was עַל־ <WH5922> upon שָׂבֵ֣י <WH7868> the elders יְהוּדָיֵ֔א <WH3062> of the Jews וְלָא־ <WH3809> that they could not בַטִּ֣לוּ <WH989> to cease הִמּ֔וֹ <WH1994> them עַד־ <WH5705> till טַעְמָ֖א <WH2941> the matter לְדָרְיָ֣וֶשׁ <WH1868> to Darius יְהָ֑ךְ <WH1946> came וֶאֱדַ֛יִן <WH116> and then יְתִיב֥וּן <WH8421> they returned answer נִשְׁתְּוָנָ֖א <WH5407> by letter עַל־ <WH5922> concerning דְּנָֽה׃ <WH1836> this פ

פַּרְשֶׁ֣גֶן <WH6573> The copy אִ֠גַּרְתָּא <WH104> of the letter דִּֽי־ <WH1768> which שְׁלַ֞ח <WH7972> sent תַּתְּנַ֣י ׀ <WH8674> Tattenai פַּחַ֣ת <WH6347> that Tatnai governor עֲבַֽר־ <WH5675> on this side נַהֲרָ֗ה <WH5103> the river וּשְׁתַ֤ר בּוֹזְנַי֙ <WH8370> and Shetharboznai וּכְנָ֣וָתֵ֔הּ <WH3675> and his companions אֲפַ֨רְסְכָיֵ֔א <WH671> the Apharsachites דִּ֖י <WH1768> who בַּעֲבַ֣ר <WH5675> which [were] on this side נַהֲרָ֑ה <WH5103> the river עַל־ <WH5922> unto דָּרְיָ֖וֶשׁ <WH1868> Darius מַלְכָּֽא׃ <WH4430> the king

פִּתְגָמָ֖א <WH6600> a letter שְׁלַ֣חוּ <WH7972> They sent עֲל֑וֹהִי <WH5922> unto וְכִדְנָה֙ <WH1836> thus כְּתִ֣יב <WH3790> was written בְּגַוֵּ֔הּ <WH1459> him wherein לְדָרְיָ֥וֶשׁ <WH1868> Unto Darius מַלְכָּ֖א <WH4430> the king שְׁלָמָ֥א <WH8001> peace כֹֽלָּא׃ <WH3606> all ס

יְדִ֣יעַ ׀ <WH3046> it be known לֶהֱוֵ֣א <WH1934> become לְמַלְכָּ֗א <WH4430> unto the king דִּֽי־ <WH1768> forasmuch אֲזַ֜לְנָא <WH236> that we went לִיה֤וּד <WH3061> of Judea מְדִֽינְתָּא֙ <WH4083> into the province לְבֵית֙ <WH1005> to the house אֱלָהָ֣א <WH426> God רַבָּ֔א <WH7229> of the great וְה֤וּא <WH1932> which מִתְבְּנֵא֙ <WH1124> which is builded אֶ֣בֶן <WH69> stones גְּלָ֔ל <WH1560> with great וְאָ֖ע <WH636> and timber מִתְּשָׂ֣ם <WH7761> is laid בְּכֻתְלַיָּ֑א <WH3797> in the walls וַעֲבִ֥ידְתָּא <WH5673> work דָ֛ךְ <WH1791> and this אָסְפַּ֥רְנָא <WH629> fast מִתְעַבְדָ֖א <WH5648> goeth וּמַצְלַ֥ח <WH6744> on and prospereth בְּיֶדְהֹֽם׃ <WH3028> in their hands ס

אֱדַ֗יִן <WH116> Then שְׁאֵ֙לְנָא֙ <WH7593> asked לְשָׂבַיָּ֣א <WH7868> elders אִלֵּ֔ךְ <WH479> we those כְּנֵ֖מָא <WH3660> unto them thus אֲמַ֣רְנָא <WH560> [and] said לְּהֹ֑ם מַן־ <WH4479> Who שָׂ֨ם <WH7761> issued לְכֹ֜ם טְעֵ֗ם <WH2942> A decree בַּיְתָ֤א <WH1005> house דְנָה֙ <WH1836> this לְמִבְנְיָ֔ה <WH1124> you to build וְאֻשַּׁרְנָ֥א <WH846> wall דְנָ֖ה <WH1836> these לְשַׁכְלָלָֽה׃ <WH3635> and to make up

וְאַ֧ף <WH638> also שְׁמָהָתְהֹ֛ם <WH8036> their names שְׁאֵ֥לְנָא <WH7593> We asked לְּהֹ֖ם לְהוֹדָעוּתָ֑ךְ <WH3046> to certify דִּ֛י <WH1768> who נִכְתֻּ֥ב <WH3790> thee that we might write שֻׁם־ <WH8036> the names גֻּבְרַיָּ֖א <WH1400> of the men דִּ֥י <WH1768> who בְרָאשֵׁיהֹֽם׃ <WH7217> that [were] the chief ס

וּכְנֵ֥מָא <WH3660> And thus פִתְגָמָ֖א <WH6600> us answer הֲתִיב֣וּנָא <WH8421> they returned לְמֵמַ֑ר <WH560> saying אֲנַ֣חְנָא <WH586> We הִמּ֡וֹ <WH1994> are עַבְדוֹהִי֩ <WH5649> the servants דִֽי־ <WH1768> forasmuch אֱלָ֨הּ <WH426> of the God שְׁמַיָּ֜א <WH8065> of heaven וְאַרְעָ֗א <WH772> and earth וּבָנַ֤יִן <WH1124> and build בַּיְתָא֙ <WH1005> the house דִּֽי־ <WH1768> forasmuch הֲוָ֨א <WH1934> that was בְנֵ֜ה <WH1124> builded מִקַּדְמַ֤ת <WH6928> ago דְּנָה֙ <WH1836> these שְׁנִ֣ין <WH8140> years שַׂגִּיאָ֔ן <WH7690> many וּמֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4430> king לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3479> of Israel רַ֔ב <WH7229> which a great בְּנָ֖הִי <WH1124> builded וְשַׁכְלְלֵֽהּ׃ <WH3635> and set up

לָהֵ֗ן <WH3861> But מִן־ <WH4481> after דִּ֨י <WH1768> forasmuch הַרְגִּ֤זוּ <WH7265> unto wrath אֲבָהֳתַ֙נָא֙ <WH2> that our fathers לֶאֱלָ֣הּ <WH426> the God שְׁמַיָּ֔א <WH8065> of heaven יְהַ֣ב <WH3052> he gave הִמּ֔וֹ <WH1994> them בְּיַ֛ד <WH3028> into the hand נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֥ר <WH5020> of Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4430> the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH895> of Babylon [כַּסְדָּיָא כ] (כַּסְדָּאָ֑ה <WH3679> Chaldean ק) וּבַיְתָ֤ה <WH1005> house דְנָה֙ <WH1836> this סַתְרֵ֔הּ <WH5642> who destroyed וְעַמָּ֖ה <WH5972> the people הַגְלִ֥י <WH1541> away לְבָבֶֽל׃ <WH895> into Babylon ס

בְּרַם֙ <WH1297> But בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8140> year חֲדָ֔ה <WH2298> in the first לְכ֥וֹרֶשׁ <WH3567> of Cyrus מַלְכָּ֖א <WH4430> the king דִּ֣י <WH1768> forasmuch בָבֶ֑ל <WH895> of Babylon כּ֤וֹרֶשׁ <WH3567> Cyrus מַלְכָּא֙ <WH4430> [the same] king שָׂ֣ם <WH7761> made טְעֵ֔ם <WH2942> a decree בֵּית־ <WH1005> house אֱלָהָ֥א <WH426> of God דְנָ֖ה <WH1836> this לִבְּנֵֽא׃ <WH1124> to build

וְ֠אַף <WH638> also מָאנַיָּ֣א <WH3984> And the vessels דִֽי־ <WH1768> of בֵית־ <WH1005> of the house אֱלָהָא֮ <WH426> of God דִּ֣י <WH1768> whom דַהֲבָ֣ה <WH1722> gold וְכַסְפָּא֒ <WH3702> and silver דִּ֣י <WH1768> whom נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֗ר <WH5020> which Nebuchadnezzar הַנְפֵּק֙ <WH5312> took מִן־ <WH4481> out of הֵֽיכְלָא֙ <WH1965> the temple דִּ֣י <WH1768> whom בִֽירוּשְׁלֶ֔ם <WH3390> that [was] in Jerusalem וְהֵיבֵ֣ל <WH2987> and brought הִמּ֔וֹ <WH1994> those לְהֵיכְלָ֖א <WH1965> them into the temple דִּ֣י <WH1768> whom בָבֶ֑ל <WH895> of Babylon הַנְפֵּ֨ק <WH5312> take הִמּ֜וֹ <WH1994> these כּ֣וֹרֶשׁ <WH3567> did Cyrus מַלְכָּ֗א <WH4430> the king מִן־ <WH4481> out of הֵֽיכְלָא֙ <WH1965> the temple דִּ֣י <WH1768> whom בָבֶ֔ל <WH895> of Babylon וִיהִ֙יבוּ֙ <WH3052> and they were delivered לְשֵׁשְׁבַּצַּ֣ר <WH8340> [was] Sheshbazzar שְׁמֵ֔הּ <WH8036> unto [one] whose name דִּ֥י <WH1768> whom פֶחָ֖ה <WH6347> governor שָׂמֵֽהּ׃ <WH7761> whom he had made

וַאֲמַר־ <WH560> And said לֵ֓הּ ׀ [אֵלֶּה כ] (אֵ֚ל <WH412> these ק) מָֽאנַיָּ֔א <WH3984> vessels שֵׂ֚א <WH5376> unto him Take אֵֽזֶל־ <WH236> go אֲחֵ֣ת <WH5182> carry הִמּ֔וֹ <WH1994> them בְּהֵיכְלָ֖א <WH1965> into the temple דִּ֣י <WH1768> in בִירוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <WH3390> that [is] in Jerusalem וּבֵ֥ית <WH1005> and let the house אֱלָהָ֖א <WH426> of God יִתְבְּנֵ֥א <WH1124> be builded עַל־ <WH5922> in אַתְרֵֽהּ׃ <WH870> his place ס

אֱדַ֙יִן֙ <WH116> Then שֵׁשְׁבַּצַּ֣ר <WH8340> Sheshbazzar דֵּ֔ךְ <WH1791> the same אֲתָ֗א <WH858> came יְהַ֧ב <WH3052> [and] laid אֻשַּׁיָּ֛א <WH787> the foundation דִּי־ <WH1768> forasmuch בֵ֥ית <WH1005> of the house אֱלָהָ֖א <WH426> of God דִּ֣י <WH1768> in בִירוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <WH3390> which [is] in Jerusalem וּמִן־ <WH4481> and since אֱדַ֧יִן <WH116> that time וְעַד־ <WH5705> even until כְּעַ֛ן <WH3705> now מִתְבְּנֵ֖א <WH1124> hath it been in building וְלָ֥א <WH3809> and [yet] it is not שְׁלִֽם׃ <WH8000> finished

וּכְעַ֞ן <WH3705> Now הֵ֧ן <WH2006> therefore if עַל־ <WH5922> to מַלְכָּ֣א <WH4430> the king טָ֗ב <WH2869> [it seem] good יִ֠תְבַּקַּר <WH1240> let there be search בְּבֵ֨ית <WH1005> house גִּנְזַיָּ֜א <WH1596> treasure דִּי־ <WH1768> which מַלְכָּ֣א <WH4430> made in the king's תַמָּה֮ <WH8536> which [is] there דִּ֣י <WH1768> which בְּבָבֶל֒ <WH895> at Babylon הֵ֣ן <WH2006> whether אִיתַ֗י <WH383> it be דִּֽי־ <WH1768> which מִן־ <WH4481> of כּ֤וֹרֶשׁ <WH3567> Cyrus מַלְכָּא֙ <WH4430> the king שִׂ֣ים <WH7761> was made טְעֵ֔ם <WH2942> [so] that a decree לְמִבְנֵ֛א <WH1124> to build בֵּית־ <WH1005> house אֱלָהָ֥א <WH426> of God דֵ֖ךְ <WH1791> this בִּירוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <WH3390> at Jerusalem וּרְע֥וּת <WH7470> his pleasure מַלְכָּ֛א <WH4430> and let the king עַל־ <WH5922> to us concerning דְּנָ֖ה <WH1836> this matter יִשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7972> send עֲלֶֽינָא׃ <WH5922> concerning ס
